title: Dailyscript
author: Dailyscript
content: There is not much real estate to convey the full topic on the subject field, so I’ll just count here. If you were to convert your Bitcoin (BTC) to Fiat (NGN), based on the current Bitcoin price will you be proud of Bitcoin you have in your portfolio since you started investing. I have very little of some other cryptocurrencies because I don’t have enough money to buy Bitcoin. However I am not satisfied with the amount of crypto I have. I feel like I have not giving more attention in investing due to my current financial strength. Since this topic is about Bitcoin, I believe many here are new or old investor in Bitcoin, this is why am curious to know your thoughts towards your own accumulation. Perhaps this topic may remind or bring your mind back to take your investment more serious if you are lacking behind. I understand the economy of the country and I know it may affect some persons to not fully invest the planned amount due to life unexpected happenings.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: This topic is confusing and there is no connection between the topic title and the main post itself,  from the title you picture a misleading message that makes it look as if you are looking for how to convert your Bitcoin to naira, but while reading the main thread, I also discovered that you are talking about bitcoin accumulations and mode or method of investment in Bitcoin and how late you are in your Bitcoin accumulation journey.Back to the discussion, bitcoin investment is supposed to be done with the mindset that, you only invest what you can afford at per time, so that when the price doesn't go in your direction, it uptrend! You still will remain in good condition to continue holding, but if you are so aimed at making quick profits, that is the only time you will have issues with the Bitcoin market behaviours since you may have to wait a long period before you make anything out of it.So sure we may think we are too late or that we have not accumulated enough Bitcoin, but along the line, we have discovered that we are still among the early birds, considering the what the price of Bitcoin will be future.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Op to be sincere you no need to get a whole 1 full bitcoin before you be bitcoiner or person wey dey hold bitcoin, na where your power reach naim you go do, beside na because of say the price of one bitcoin don high well well and some person no go fit buy ones naim make this DCA idea come to play so, so even if the money nor dey to buy 1BTC you fit dey put small small money and before you go know you don get 1BTC. So make e no be say na to buy 1BTC ones naim be your excuse wey you never buy, because this period naim be the best time to even accumulate more and after now maybe next year we go start to dey get enough profit. So concerning how I take dey buy bitcoin, na DCA I dey use, when dem pay me for work I dey commit small dey put for my bitcoin portfolio.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: I think you mean to convert fiat to bitcoin, instead of to convert bitcoin to fiat. If you do not have enough coins, you do not need to buy at once. But you need to hurry because the day United States SEC will approve spot bitcoin ETF is getting nearer. I think it will be between December 25th to January 10 based on what I have been reading online. But the price will still increase more as bitcoin will halve in April 2024 and more people will invest. Bitcoin is likely going six digits before 2026.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: First of, your writeup is as confusing as hell and it's not easy to understand the message you are trying to pass across to be honest but regarding the question on knowing the amount of bitcoin we've accumulated, Should the amount of bitcoin you've been able to accumulate become your major concern? The amount of bitcoin you have at your disposal is dependent on a whole lot of things and ranging from the time you knew about Bitcoin to the way you used in accumilating your bitcoin and of course, how much you have that you can use in investing into bitcoin that wouldn't give you a restless mind. So what ever quantity of bitcoin you are able to accumulate based on this parameters, you should be okay with it and look out for the most convenient and efficient way you can use in increasing the amount of Bitcoin you're accumilating.

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: Quote from: Dailyscript on December 02, 2023, 01:49:14 AM However I am not satisfied with the amount of crypto I have. I feel like I have not giving more attention in investing due to my current financial strength. Since this topic is about Bitcoin, I believe many here are new or old investor in Bitcoin, this is why am curious to know your thoughts towards your own accumulation. Perhaps this topic may remind or bring your mind back to take your investment more serious if you are lacking behind. I understand the economy of the country and I know it may affect some persons to not fully invest the planned amount due to life unexpected happenings.  If you’ve not accumulated enough bitcoin, you still have time to do that and await the ultimate bull run season. Many things must have happened one way or the other while accumulating bitcoin that will stop one from having a lots of them stored in their wallets for the bull run. That shouldn’t weaken you but rather continue accumulating gradually. If you stop when you can invest as little as you can that’s when you’ve began to fail in your investment. You don’t have to borrow money to invest, just keep it simple and continue your accumulation. The ultimate goal is to gain profit and that will happen after investment and patience which is expected from every investor as they await to reap their profits.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Quote from: Dailyscript on December 02, 2023, 01:49:14 AMif you were to convert your Bitcoin (BTC) to Fiat (NGN), based on the current Bitcoin price will you be proud of Bitcoin you have in your portfolio since you started investing. Op, this current Bitcoin price will not make me convert my Bitcoin to fiat because the current Bitcoin price is showing strength for the Bitcoin halve that will take place next year in April with no estimated date. And if I convert my Bitcoin to fiat na me go still lose because Bitcoin will set another ATH after halve don takes place o, I would rather hold my Bitcoin till the new Bitcoin all-time high reaches.  Quotethis is why am curious to know your thoughts towards your own accumulation. I mainly used the DCA strategy to accumulate my Bitcoin because, with the DCA strategy, I can buy my Bitcoin at different prices which will help to control the volatile part of Bitcoin in my hodling. But sometimes if I have enough money I accumulate my Bitcoin with three strategies which are lump sum buy, buy the Bitcoin dip, and buy through the DCA strategy, these strategies help me to accumulate the quantity of Bitcoin that I want faster.

But if I may ask, is there anything called "planned amount? That is, with the way the hardship and steady increase in the price of goods and services for we country dey? See bro/sis, for me, inasmuch you have that amount good enough to afford all your basic needs this present times, for me, I will say that is enough for me, because for the fact that there is life, there is still hope, so let nobody pressure you into doing what you ought not to just for the fact you trying to hit that thing called planned amount.
